name: The Wanderer: Chosen One
description:
The Wanderer: Chosen One is an epic fantasy 2.5D action platformer about bretrayal and justice. Explore different kingdoms, battle againts the fallen guardians and restore order all by yourself. Forge your destiny and follow the path of the ancient magic bestowed on you... The Chosen One.

You can follow the progress of The Wanderer on my YouTube channel 
(P.S. I speak spanish on that channel)
